 27 /**
 28  * @constructor
 29  */
 30 odf.Style2CSS = function Style2CSS() {
 31     "use strict";
 32     var // helper constants
 33         /**@const
 34            @type{!string}*/
 35         drawns = odf.Namespaces.drawns,
 36         /**@const
 37            @type{!string}*/

 43            @type{!string}*/

 86                 'regular-polygon' ],

102                 'illustration-index', 'index-title', 'object-index', 'section',
103                 'table-of-content', 'table-index', 'user-index'],
104             'table': ['background', 'table'],

106                 'even-rows', 'first-column', 'first-row', 'last-column',
107                 'last-row', 'odd-columns', 'odd-rows', 'table-cell'],
108             'table-column': ['table-column'],
109             'table-row': ['table-row'],
110             'text': ['a', 'index-entry-chapter', 'index-entry-link-end',
111                 'index-entry-link-start', 'index-entry-page-number',

113                 'index-title-template', 'linenumbering-configuration',
114                 'list-level-style-number', 'list-level-style-bullet',
115                 'outline-level-style', 'span'],
116             'list': ['list-item']
117         },
118

120            @type{!Array.<!Array.<!string>>}*/
121         textPropertySimpleMapping = [
122             [ fons, 'color', 'color' ],
123             // this sets the element background, not just the text background
124             [ fons, 'background-color', 'background-color' ],
125             [ fons, 'font-weight', 'font-weight' ],
126             [ fons, 'font-style', 'font-style' ]

164             [ svgns, 'stroke-color', 'border-color' ],
165             [ svgns, 'stroke-width', 'border-width' ],
166             [ fons, 'border', 'border' ],
167             [ fons, 'border-left', 'border-left' ],
168             [ fons, 'border-right', 'border-right' ],
169             [ fons, 'border-top', 'border-top' ],

178             [ fons, 'border-right', 'border-right' ],

181             [ fons, 'border', 'border' ]

192         tablerowPropertySimpleMapping = [
193             [ stylens, 'row-height', 'height' ],
194             [ fons, 'keep-together', null ]
195         ],
196

198            @type{!Array.<!Array.<!string>>}*/
199         tablePropertySimpleMapping = [
200             [ stylens, 'width', 'width' ],
201             [ fons, 'margin-left', 'margin-left' ],
202             [ fons, 'margin-right', 'margin-right' ],
203             [ fons, 'margin-top', 'margin-top' ],
204             [ fons, 'margin-bottom', 'margin-bottom' ]

209         pageContentPropertySimpleMapping = [
210             [ fons, 'background-color', 'background-color' ],
211             [ fons, 'padding', 'padding' ],
212             [ fons, 'padding-left', 'padding-left' ],
213             [ fons, 'padding-right', 'padding-right' ],
214             [ fons, 'padding-top', 'padding-top' ],
215             [ fons, 'padding-bottom', 'padding-bottom' ],
216             [ fons, 'border', 'border' ],
217             [ fons, 'border-left', 'border-left' ],
218             [ fons, 'border-right', 'border-right' ],
219             [ fons, 'border-top', 'border-top' ],
220             [ fons, 'border-bottom', 'border-bottom' ],
221             [ fons, 'margin', 'margin' ],
222             [ fons, 'margin-left', 'margin-left' ],
223             [ fons, 'margin-right', 'margin-right' ],
224             [ fons, 'margin-top', 'margin-top' ],
225             [ fons, 'margin-bottom', 'margin-bottom' ]
226         ],
227 
228         /**@const
229            @type{!Array.<!Array.<!string>>}*/
230         pageSizePropertySimpleMapping = [
231             [ fons, 'page-width', 'width' ],
232             [ fons, 'page-height', 'height' ]
233         ],
234 
235         /**@const
236            @type{!Object.<!boolean>}*/
237         borderPropertyMap = {
238             'border': true,
239             'border-left': true,
240             'border-right': true,
241             'border-top': true,
242             'border-bottom': true,
243             'stroke-width': true
244         },
245 
246         // A font-face declaration map, to be populated once style2css is called.
247         /**@type{!Object.<string,string>}*/
248         fontFaceDeclsMap = {},
249         utils = new odf.OdfUtils(),
250         documentType,
251         odfRoot,
252         defaultFontSize,
253         xpath = xmldom.XPath,
254         cssUnits = new core.CSSUnits();
255 
256     /**
257      * @param {!string} family
258      * @param {!string} name
259      * @return {?string}
260      */
261     function createSelector(family, name) {
262         var prefix = familynamespaceprefixes[family],
263             namepart,
264             selector;
265         if (prefix === undefined) {
266             return null;
267         }
268 
269         // If there is no name, it is a default style, in which case style-name shall be used without a value
270         if (name) {
271             namepart = '[' + prefix + '|style-name="' + name + '"]';
272         } else {
273             namepart = '';
274         }
275         if (prefix === 'presentation') {
276             prefix = 'draw';
277             if (name) {
278                 namepart = '[presentation|style-name="' + name + '"]';
279             } else {
280                 namepart = '';
281             }
282         }
283         selector = prefix + '|' + familytagnames[family].join(
284             namepart + ',' + prefix + '|'
285         ) + namepart;
286         return selector;
287     }
288     /**
289      * @param {!string} family
290      * @param {!string} name
291      * @param {!odf.StyleTreeNode} node
292      * @return {!Array.<string>}
293      */
294     function getSelectors(family, name, node) {
295         var selectors = [], ss,
296             derivedStyles = node.derivedStyles,
297             /**@type{string}*/
298             n;
299         ss = createSelector(family, name);
300         if (ss !== null) {
301             selectors.push(ss);
302         }
303         for (n in derivedStyles) {
304             if (derivedStyles.hasOwnProperty(n)) {
305                 ss = getSelectors(family, n, derivedStyles[n]);
306                 selectors = selectors.concat(ss);
307             }
308         }
309         return selectors;
310     }
311     /**
312      * Make sure border width is no less than 1px wide; otherwise border is not rendered.
313      * Only have problems with point unit at the moment. Please add more rule if needed.
314      * @param {!string} value a string contains border attributes eg. 1pt solid black or 1px
315      * @return {!string}
316      */
317     function fixBorderWidth(value) {
318         var index = value.indexOf(' '),
319             width, theRestOfBorderAttributes;
320 
321         if (index !== -1) {
322             width = value.substring(0, index);
323             theRestOfBorderAttributes = value.substring(index); // everything after the width attribute
324         } else {
325             width = value;
326             theRestOfBorderAttributes = '';
327         }
328 
329         width = utils.parseLength(width);
330         // According to CSS 2.1, 1px is equal to 0.75pt http://www.w3.org/TR/CSS2/syndata.html#length-units
331         if (width && width.unit === 'pt' && width.value < 0.75) {
332             value = '0.75pt' + theRestOfBorderAttributes;
333         }
334         return value;
335     }
336     /**
337      * @param {!Element} props
338      * @param {!Array.<!Array.<!string>>} mapping
339      * @return {!string}
340      */
341     function applySimpleMapping(props, mapping) {
342         var rule = '', i, r, value;
343         for (i = 0; i < mapping.length; i += 1) {
344             r = mapping[i];
345             value = props.getAttributeNS(r[0], r[1]);
346 
347             if (value) {
348                 value = value.trim();
349 
350                 if (borderPropertyMap.hasOwnProperty(r[1])) {
351                     value = fixBorderWidth(value);
352                 }
353                 if (r[2]) {
354                     rule += r[2] + ':' + value + ';';
355                 }
356             }
357         }
358         return rule;
359     }
360 
361     /**
362      * Returns the font size attribute value from the text properties of a style node
363      * @param {?Element} styleNode
364      * @return {?{value: !number, unit: !string}}
365      */
366     function getFontSize(styleNode) {
367         var props = domUtils.getDirectChild(styleNode, stylens, 'text-properties');
368         if (props) {
369             return utils.parseFoFontSize(props.getAttributeNS(fons, 'font-size'));
370         }
371         return null;
372     }
373 
374     /**
375      * Returns the parent style node of a given style node
376      * @param {!Element} styleNode
377      * @return {Element}
378      */
379     function getParentStyleNode(styleNode) {
380         var parentStyleName = '',
381             parentStyleFamily = '',
382             parentStyleNode = null,
383             xp;
384 
385         if (styleNode.localName === 'default-style') {
386             return null;
387         }
388 
389         parentStyleName = styleNode.getAttributeNS(stylens, 'parent-style-name');
390         parentStyleFamily = styleNode.getAttributeNS(stylens, 'family');
391         
392         if (parentStyleName) {
393             xp = "//style:*[@style:name='" + parentStyleName + "'][@style:family='" + parentStyleFamily + "']";
394         } else {
395             xp = "//style:default-style[@style:family='" + parentStyleFamily + "']";
396         }
397         parentStyleNode = xpath.getODFElementsWithXPath(/**@type{!Element}*/(odfRoot), xp, odf.Namespaces.lookupNamespaceURI)[0];
398         return parentStyleNode;
399     }
400     /**
401      * @param {!Element} props
402      * @return {!string}
403      */
404     function getTextProperties(props) {
405         var rule = '', fontName, fontSize, value, textDecoration = '',
406             fontSizeRule = '',
407             sizeMultiplier = 1,
408             parentStyle;
409 
410         rule += applySimpleMapping(props, textPropertySimpleMapping);
411 
412         value = props.getAttributeNS(stylens, 'text-underline-style');
413         if (value === 'solid') {
414             textDecoration += ' underline';
415         }
416         value = props.getAttributeNS(stylens, 'text-line-through-style');
417         if (value === 'solid') {
418             textDecoration += ' line-through';
419         }
420 
421         if (textDecoration.length) {
422             textDecoration = 'text-decoration:' + textDecoration + ';';
423             rule += textDecoration;
424         }
425 
426         fontName = props.getAttributeNS(stylens, 'font-name')
427             || props.getAttributeNS(fons, 'font-family');
428         if (fontName) {
429             value = fontFaceDeclsMap[fontName];
430             // TODO: use other information from style:font-face, like style:font-family-generic
431             rule += 'font-family: ' + (value || fontName) + ';';
432         }
433 
434         parentStyle = /**@type{!Element}*/(props.parentNode);
435         fontSize = getFontSize(parentStyle);
436         // This is actually the font size of the current style.
437         if (!fontSize) {
438             return rule;
439         }
440 
441         while (parentStyle) {
442             fontSize = getFontSize(parentStyle);
443             if (fontSize) {
444                 // If the current style's font size is a non-% value, then apply the multiplier to get the child style (with the %)'s
445                 // actual font size. And now we can stop crawling up the style ancestry since we have a concrete font size.
446                 if (fontSize.unit !== '%') {
447                     fontSizeRule = 'font-size: ' + (fontSize.value * sizeMultiplier) + fontSize.unit + ';';
448                     break;
449                 }
450                 // If we got a % font size for the current style, then update the multiplier with it's 'normalized' multiplier
451                 sizeMultiplier *= (fontSize.value / 100);
452             }
453             // Crawl up the style ancestry
454             parentStyle = getParentStyleNode(parentStyle);
455         }
456 
457         // If there was nothing in the ancestry that specified a concrete font size, just apply the multiplier onto the page's default font size.
458         if (!fontSizeRule) {
459             fontSizeRule = 'font-size: ' + parseFloat(defaultFontSize) * sizeMultiplier + cssUnits.getUnits(defaultFontSize) + ';';
460         }
461 
462         rule += fontSizeRule;
463         return rule;
464     }
465     /**
466      * @param {!Element} props <style:paragraph-properties/>
467      * @return {!string}
468      */
469     function getParagraphProperties(props) {
470         var rule = '', bgimage, url, lineHeight;
471         rule += applySimpleMapping(props, paragraphPropertySimpleMapping);
472         bgimage = domUtils.getDirectChild(props, stylens, 'background-image');
473         if (bgimage) {
474             url = bgimage.getAttributeNS(xlinkns, 'href');
475             if (url) {
476                 rule += "background-image: url('odfkit:" + url + "');";
477                 //rule += "background-repeat: repeat;"; //FIXME test
478                 rule += applySimpleMapping(bgimage, bgImageSimpleMapping);
479             }
480         }
481 
482         lineHeight = props.getAttributeNS(fons, 'line-height');
483         if (lineHeight && lineHeight !== 'normal') {
484             lineHeight = utils.parseFoLineHeight(lineHeight);
485             if (lineHeight.unit !== '%') {
486                 rule += 'line-height: ' + lineHeight.value + lineHeight.unit + ';';
487             } else {
488                 rule += 'line-height: ' + lineHeight.value / 100 + ';';
489             }
490         }
491 
492         return rule;
493     }
494 
495 /*jslint unparam: true*/
496     /**
497      * @param {*} m
498      * @param {string} r
499      * @param {string} g
500      * @param {string} b
501      * @return {string}
502      */
503     function matchToRgb(m, r, g, b) {
504         return r + r + g + g + b + b;
505     }
506 /*jslint unparam: false*/
507 
508     /**
509      * @param {!string} hex
510      * @return {?{ r: number, g: number, b: number}}
511      */
512     function hexToRgb(hex) {
513         // Expand shorthand form (e.g. "03F") to full form (e.g. "0033FF")
514         var result,
515             shorthandRegex = /^#?([a-f\d])([a-f\d])([a-f\d])$/i;
516         hex = hex.replace(shorthandRegex, matchToRgb);
517 
518         result = /^#?([a-f\d]{2})([a-f\d]{2})([a-f\d]{2})$/i.exec(hex);
519         return result ? {
520             r: parseInt(result[1], 16),
521             g: parseInt(result[2], 16),
522             b: parseInt(result[3], 16)
523         } : null;
524     }
525 
526     /**
527      * @param {string} n
528      * @return {boolean}
529      */
530     function isNumber(n) {
531         return !isNaN(parseFloat(n));
532     }
533 
534    /**
535      * @param {!Element} props
536      * @return {string}
537      */
538     function getGraphicProperties(props) {
539         var rule = '', alpha, bgcolor, fill;
540 
541         rule += applySimpleMapping(props, graphicPropertySimpleMapping);
542         alpha = props.getAttributeNS(drawns, 'opacity');
543         fill = props.getAttributeNS(drawns, 'fill');
544         bgcolor = props.getAttributeNS(drawns, 'fill-color');
545 
546         if (fill === 'solid' || fill === 'hatch') {
547             if (bgcolor && bgcolor !== 'none') {
548                 alpha = isNumber(alpha) ? parseFloat(alpha) / 100 : 1;
549                 bgcolor = hexToRgb(bgcolor);
550                 if (bgcolor) {
551                     rule += "background-color: rgba("
552                         + bgcolor.r + ","
553                         + bgcolor.g + ","
554                         + bgcolor.b + ","
555                         + alpha + ");";
556                 }
557             } else {
558                 rule += "background: none;";
559             }
560         } else if (fill === "none") {
561             rule += "background: none;";
562         }
563 
564         return rule;
565     }
566    /**
567      * @param {!Element} props
568      * @return {string}
569      */
570     function getDrawingPageProperties(props) {
571         var rule = '';
572 
573         rule += applySimpleMapping(props, graphicPropertySimpleMapping);
574         if (props.getAttributeNS(presentationns, 'background-visible') === 'true') {
575             rule += "background: none;";
576         }
577         return rule;
578     }
579     /**
580      * @param {!Element} props
581      * @return {string}
582      */
583     function getTableCellProperties(props) {
584         var rule = '';
585         rule += applySimpleMapping(props, tablecellPropertySimpleMapping);
586         return rule;
587     }
588     /**
589      * @param {!Element} props
590      * @return {string}
591      */
592     function getTableRowProperties(props) {
593         var rule = '';
594         rule += applySimpleMapping(props, tablerowPropertySimpleMapping);
595         return rule;
596     }
597     /**
598      * @param {!Element} props
599      * @return {string}
600      */
601     function getTableColumnProperties(props) {
602         var rule = '';
603         rule += applySimpleMapping(props, tablecolumnPropertySimpleMapping);
604         return rule;
605     }
606     /**
607      * @param {!Element} props
608      * @return {string}
609      */
610     function getTableProperties(props) {
611         var rule = '', borderModel;
612         rule += applySimpleMapping(props, tablePropertySimpleMapping);
613         borderModel = props.getAttributeNS(tablens, 'border-model');
614 
615         if (borderModel === 'collapsing') {
616             rule += 'border-collapse:collapse;';
617         } else if (borderModel === 'separating') {
618             rule += 'border-collapse:separate;';
619         }
620 
621         return rule;
622     }
623 
624     /**
625      * Gets a list with the names of all styles derived from the given style,
626      * including the name of the style itself.
627      * @param {!string} styleName
628      * @param {!odf.StyleTreeNode} node
629      * @return {!Array.<!string>}
630      */
631     function getDerivedStyleNames(styleName, node) {
632         var /** @type{!Array.<!string>} */
633             styleNames = [styleName],
634             derivedStyles = node.derivedStyles;
635 
636         Object.keys(derivedStyles).forEach(function(styleName) {
637             var dsn = getDerivedStyleNames(styleName, derivedStyles[styleName]);
638             styleNames = styleNames.concat(dsn);
639         });
640 
641         return styleNames;
642     }
643 
644     /**
645      * Adds rules to control the display of certain frame classes in master pages
646      * when shown in page using the master page.
647      * @param {!CSSStyleSheet} sheet
648      * @param {!string} styleName
649      * @param {!Element} properties
650      * @param {!odf.StyleTreeNode} node
651      * @return {undefined}
652      */
653     function addDrawPageFrameDisplayRules(sheet, styleName, properties, node) {
654         var /**@const
655                @type {!Array.<!string>}*/
656             frameClasses = ["page-number", "date-time", "header", "footer"],
657             styleNames = getDerivedStyleNames(styleName, node),
658             /**@type {!Array.<!string>}*/
659             visibleFrameClasses = [],
660             /**@type {!Array.<!string>}*/
661             invisibleFrameClasses = [];
662 
663         /**
664          * @param {!Array.<!string>} controlledFrameClasses
665          * @param {!string} visibility
666          * @return {undefined}
667          */
668         function insertFrameVisibilityRule(controlledFrameClasses, visibility) {
669             var selectors = [],
670                 rule;
671             controlledFrameClasses.forEach(function(frameClass) {
672                 styleNames.forEach(function(styleName) {
673                     selectors.push("draw|page[webodfhelper|page-style-name='"+styleName+"'] draw|frame[presentation|class='"+frameClass+"']");
674                 });
675             });
676             if (selectors.length > 0) {
677                 rule = selectors.join(",") + "{visibility:"+visibility+";}";
678                 sheet.insertRule(rule, sheet.cssRules.length);
679             }
680         }
681 
682         frameClasses.forEach(function(frameClass) {
683             var displayValue;
684 
685             displayValue = properties.getAttributeNS(presentationns, 'display-'+frameClass);
686             if (displayValue === 'true') {
687                 visibleFrameClasses.push(frameClass);
688             } else if (displayValue === 'false') {
689                 invisibleFrameClasses.push(frameClass);
690             } // else the attribute does not exist (returned as ""/null) or has a bad value
691 
692         });
693 
694         insertFrameVisibilityRule(visibleFrameClasses, "visible");
695         insertFrameVisibilityRule(invisibleFrameClasses, "hidden");
696     }
697 
698     /**
699      * @param {!CSSStyleSheet} sheet
700      * @param {string} family
701      * @param {string} name
702      * @param {!odf.StyleTreeNode} node
703      * @return {undefined}
704      */
705     function addStyleRule(sheet, family, name, node) {
706         var selectors = getSelectors(family, name, node),
707             selector = selectors.join(','),
708             rule = '',
709             properties;
710 
711         properties = domUtils.getDirectChild(node.element, stylens, 'text-properties');
712         if (properties) {
713             rule += getTextProperties(properties);
714         }
715         properties = domUtils.getDirectChild(node.element,
716                 stylens, 'paragraph-properties');
717         if (properties) {
718             rule += getParagraphProperties(properties);
719         }
720         properties = domUtils.getDirectChild(node.element,
721                  stylens, 'graphic-properties');
722         if (properties) {
723             rule += getGraphicProperties(properties);
724         }
725         properties = domUtils.getDirectChild(node.element,
726                  stylens, 'drawing-page-properties');
727         if (properties) {
728             rule += getDrawingPageProperties(properties);
729             addDrawPageFrameDisplayRules(sheet, name, /**@type{!Element}*/(properties), node);
730         }
731         properties = domUtils.getDirectChild(node.element,
732                  stylens, 'table-cell-properties');
733         if (properties) {
734             rule += getTableCellProperties(properties);
735         }
736         properties = domUtils.getDirectChild(node.element,
737                  stylens, 'table-row-properties');
738         if (properties) {
739             rule += getTableRowProperties(properties);
740         }
741         properties = domUtils.getDirectChild(node.element,
742                  stylens, 'table-column-properties');
743         if (properties) {
744             rule += getTableColumnProperties(properties);
745         }
746         properties = domUtils.getDirectChild(node.element,
747                  stylens, 'table-properties');
748         if (properties) {
749             rule += getTableProperties(properties);
750         }
751         if (rule.length === 0) {
752             return;
753         }
754         rule = selector + '{' + rule + '}';
755         sheet.insertRule(rule, sheet.cssRules.length);
756     }
757 
758     /**
759      * @param {!CSSStyleSheet} sheet
760      * @param {!Element} node <style:page-layout/>/<style:default-page-layout/>
761      * @return {undefined}
762      */
763     function addPageStyleRules(sheet, node) {
764         var rule = '', imageProps, url,
765             contentLayoutRule = '',
766             pageSizeRule = '',
767             props = domUtils.getDirectChild(node, stylens, 'page-layout-properties'),
768             stylename,
769             masterStyles,
770             e,
771             masterStyleName;
772         if (!props) {
773             return;
774         }
775         stylename = node.getAttributeNS(stylens, 'name');
776 
777         rule += applySimpleMapping(props, pageContentPropertySimpleMapping);
778         imageProps = domUtils.getDirectChild(props, stylens, 'background-image');
779         if (imageProps) {
780             url = imageProps.getAttributeNS(xlinkns, 'href');
781             if (url) {
782                 rule += "background-image: url('odfkit:" + url + "');";
783                 //rule += "background-repeat: repeat;"; //FIXME test
784                 rule += applySimpleMapping(imageProps, bgImageSimpleMapping);
785             }
786         }
787 
788         if (documentType === 'presentation') {
789             masterStyles = domUtils.getDirectChild(/**@type{!Element}*/(node.parentNode.parentNode), officens, 'master-styles');
790             e = masterStyles && masterStyles.firstElementChild;
791             while (e) {
792                 // Generate CSS for all the pages that use the master page that use this page-layout
793                 if (e.namespaceURI === stylens && e.localName === "master-page"
794                         && e.getAttributeNS(stylens, 'page-layout-name')
795                             === stylename) {
796                     masterStyleName = e.getAttributeNS(stylens, 'name');
797 
798                     contentLayoutRule = 'draw|page[draw|master-page-name=' + masterStyleName + '] {' + rule + '}';
799                     pageSizeRule = 'office|body, draw|page[draw|master-page-name=' + masterStyleName + '] {'
800                             + applySimpleMapping(props, pageSizePropertySimpleMapping)
801                             + ' }';
802 
803                     sheet.insertRule(contentLayoutRule, sheet.cssRules.length);
804                     sheet.insertRule(pageSizeRule, sheet.cssRules.length);
805                 }
806                 e = e.nextElementSibling;
807             }
808 
809         } else if (documentType === 'text') {
810             contentLayoutRule = 'office|text {' + rule + '}';
811             rule = '';
812 
813             // TODO: We want to use the simpleMapping for ODTs, but not until we have pagination.
814             // So till then, set only the width.
815             //rule += applySimpleMapping(props, pageSizePropertySimpleMapping);
816             pageSizeRule = 'office|body {'
817                 + 'width: ' + props.getAttributeNS(fons, 'page-width') + ';'
818                 + '}';
819 
820             sheet.insertRule(contentLayoutRule, sheet.cssRules.length);
821             sheet.insertRule(pageSizeRule, sheet.cssRules.length);
822         }
823 
824     }
825 
826     /**
827      * @param {!CSSStyleSheet} sheet
828      * @param {string} family
829      * @param {string} name
830      * @param {!odf.StyleTreeNode} node
831      * @return {undefined}
832      */
833     function addRule(sheet, family, name, node) {
834         if (family === "page") {
835             addPageStyleRules(sheet, node.element);
836         } else {
837             addStyleRule(sheet, family, name, node);
838         }
839     }
840     /**
841      * @param {!CSSStyleSheet} sheet
842      * @param {string} family
843      * @param {string} name
844      * @param {!odf.StyleTreeNode} node
845      * @return {undefined}
846      */
847     function addRules(sheet, family, name, node) {
848         addRule(sheet, family, name, node);
849         var /**@type{string}*/
850             n;
851         for (n in node.derivedStyles) {
852             if (node.derivedStyles.hasOwnProperty(n)) {
853                 addRules(sheet, family, n, node.derivedStyles[n]);
854             }
855         }
856     }
857 
858     // css vs odf styles
859     // ODF styles occur in families. A family is a group of odf elements to
860     // which an element applies. ODF families can be mapped to a group of css
861     // elements
862 
863     /**
864      * @param {!string} doctype
865      * @param {!Element} rootNode
866      * @param {!CSSStyleSheet} stylesheet
867      * @param {!Object.<string,string>} fontFaceMap
868      * @param {!Object.<string,!Object.<string,!odf.StyleTreeNode>>} styleTree
869      * @return {undefined}
870      */
871     this.style2css = function (doctype, rootNode, stylesheet, fontFaceMap, styleTree) {
872         var tree, rule,
873             /**@type{string}*/
874             name,
875             /**@type{string}*/
876             family;
877 
878         /**
879          * @param {!string} prefix
880          * @param {!string} ns
881          * @return {undefined}
882          */
883         function insertCSSNamespace(prefix, ns) {
884             rule = '@namespace ' + prefix + ' url(' + ns + ');';
885             try {
886                 stylesheet.insertRule(rule, stylesheet.cssRules.length);
887             } catch (/**@type{!DOMException}*/ignore) {
888                 // WebKit can throw an exception here, but it will have
889                 // retained the namespace declarations anyway.
890             }
891         }
892 
893         odfRoot = rootNode;
894 
895         // make stylesheet empty
896         while (stylesheet.cssRules.length) {
897             stylesheet.deleteRule(stylesheet.cssRules.length - 1);
898         }
899 
900         // add @odfRoot namespace rules
901         odf.Namespaces.forEachPrefix(insertCSSNamespace);
902         insertCSSNamespace("webodfhelper", webodfhelperns);
903 
904         fontFaceDeclsMap = fontFaceMap;
905         documentType = doctype;
906         defaultFontSize = runtime.getWindow().getComputedStyle(document.body, null).getPropertyValue('font-size') || '12pt';
907 
908         // add the various styles
909         for (family in familynamespaceprefixes) {
910             if (familynamespaceprefixes.hasOwnProperty(family)) {
911                 tree = styleTree[family];
912                 for (name in tree) {
913                     if (tree.hasOwnProperty(name)) {
914                         addRules(stylesheet, family, name, tree[name]);
915                     }
916                 }
917             }
918         }
919     };
920 };
921
